gurmukhi: ਚਰਨ ਸਰਨਿ ਮਨ ਬਚ ਕ੍ਰਮ ਹੁੲਿ ੲਿਕਤ੍ਰ ਤਨ ਤ੍ਰਿਭਵਨ ਗਤਿ ਅਲਖ ਲਖਾੲੀ ਹੈ
transliteration: Charan Sarani Man Bach Kram Hui Ikatr Tana , Tribhavan Gati Alakh Lakhaaee Hai ?
translation: Because of the refuge of True Guru and moulding his mind, words and actions as per His teachings, a Guru-conscious person learns the happenings of the three worlds innately. He recognises the true Lord residing within.

gurmukhi: ਮਨ ਬਚ ਕਰਮ ਕਰਮ ਮਨ ਬਚਨ ਕੈ ਬਚਨ ਕਰਮ ਮਨ ੳੁਨਮਨੀ ਛਾੲੀ ਹੈ
transliteration: Man Bach Karam Karam Man Bachan Kai , Bachan Karam Man Ounamanee Chhaaee Hai ?
translation: With the harmony of actions, mind and words, the thoughts of the mind, the utterance of the words and actions performed are influenced.

gurmukhi: ਗਿਅਾਨੀ ਧਿਅਾਨੀ ਕਰਨੀ ਜਿੳੁ ਗੁਰ ਮਹੂਅਾ ਕਮਾਦਿ ਨਿਝਰ ਅਪਾਰ ਧਾਰ ਭਾਠੀ ਕੈ ਚੁਅਾੲੀ ਹੈ
transliteration: Giaanee Dhiaanee Karanee Jiu Gur Mahooaa Kamaadi , Nijhar Apaar Dhaar Bhaatthee Kai Chuaaee Hai ?
translation: As wine is brewed from jaggery, sugarcane and Madhuca Indica flowers, so does a Guru-conscious person obtains the unique flow of elixir of Naam when Gyan of his Guru's precepts, Dhyan (concentration of mind) on these precepts and clean actions are perform

gurmukhi: ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਰਸ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਨਿਧਾਨ ਪਾਨ ਪੂਰਨ ਹੁੲਿ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੰਧਿ ਮਿਲੇ ਸਹਜ ਸਮਾੲੀ ਹੈ ||੪੮||
transliteration: Praym Ras Anmrit Nidhaan Paan Pooran Hui , Gurmukhi Sandhi Milay Sahaj Samaaee Hai ?48?
translation: Guru-conscious person satiates himself by drinking deep the loving elixir of Lord's name and by his union with the divine word of the True Guru, he resides in a state of equipoise. (48)
